subHeader: To know how FusionCharts works, it is important to understand the various components and concepts of a chart

content.header: Below are different sections with interactive annotated images describing various components and concepts of charts

annotations.annotationDesc: Outlines the color variation of the different gegraphical entities based on their values. An array consisting of objects with range of values along with the color code.
An array of objects where an individual object represents a geogrsphical area.

annotationLinks.linkDesc: It is an array of labels representing different quarters as shown above

annotations.annotationDesc: id is the unique identifier for eacch location. For example, if you want to denote Africa, the value for the corresponding id must be AF and not AFR.
value brings the numerical significance to the geographical entity concerning the use-case mapping
